name: Click & Slay
description:
Click & Slay is an Adventure Idle Clicker in its Pre Alpha Stage. Upgrade your Arsenal while you explore unknown lands and slay the creatures within.

Roadmap: 

Pre -Alpha (Dec 2020 - Mid January)

 Alpha and Beta Phase (Mid January - April)

 Big News Arrives Mid to Late March. 

 Features to Except: 

-Unique Zones and Worlds with Hidden Treasures and Monsters 

-Legendary Weaponry to Assist you in your Adventure 

-Thousands of Upgrades and Achievements

 -Much Much More...
